titles: An homelye or sermon of good and euill angels: preached by the Reuerend D. Vrbanus Rhegius, pastor and superintendent of Christes Church at Zelle in Saxony. Anno. 1537. Newly translated into English by Ric. Ro. citizen of London. 1583.  Seene, perused, and allowed
Sermon von den guten und boesen engeln. English
author: Rhegius, Urbanus, 1489-1541.
Robinson, Richard, citizen of London.
notes: A translation, by Richard Robinson, of: Rhegius, Urbanus.  Ein sermon von den guten und boesen engeln.
Running title reads: A sermon of good and euill angels.
Appended, with caption title: A prayer. A prayer vnto God, for the assistance of his angelicall powers, in the prosperous preseruation of this our mortall race.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
